instructions: Put the charger at the bottom middle of the cloth.
Put the dinner fork directly to the left of the charger with the prongs pointing up.
Put the dinner knife directly right of the charger with the blade on the charger side.
Put the salad fork to the left of the dinner fork prongs pointing up.
Put the salad knife to the right of the dinner knife, facing the same direction.
Put the soup spoon to the right of the salad knife with the bowl pointing up
Put the dessert spoon horizontally above the charger with the bowl pointing to the left.
Put the dessert fork horizontally below the dessert spoon with the prongs pointing to the right
Put the bread plate above the forks.
Put the butter knife diagonally across the bread plate.
Put the water glass above the knives,
Put the napkin horizontally across the plate.
